title: A proclamation set furthe by the Kynges Maiesty, with the aduise of his most honorable privey counsayll, for the valuacion of the shillinges  and grotes to a meaner and lower value and rate
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1547-1553 : Edward VI)
notes: "Geuen the last of Aprill, in the v. yere of the reigne of our sayd souereigne Lorde king Edward the vi."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
